潃字的基本解释

潃
xiǔ
古同“滫”。

潃字的汉语字典释义

[①]［xiǔ］
［《廣韻》息有切，上有，心。］
［《集韻》踈鳩切，平尤，生。］
亦作“潃1”。
(1)酸臭的陈淘米水。亦泛指污臭之水。
(2)浸泡淘洗。参见“滫滌”。
(3)用淀粉拌和食物，使之柔软滑爽。亦指食物柔软滑爽。

潃字的康熙字典解释

【巳集上】【水字部】　潃； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页648第24
【史記·倉公列傳】病得之流汗出潃。潃者，去衣而汗晞也。【註】潃，音巡。○按《字彙補》作潃，誤。　潃字右旁从㣊，不从?作。

潃字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
潃字的起名意思

暂无。

Shame
Basic explanation of words
Shame
xiǔ
The ancient same "Xu".
Shame
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［xiǔ］
["Guangyun" has a sharp breath, a supremacy, and a heart. ]
["Jiyun" Gejiuqi, Pingyou, Sheng. ]
Also known as "潃1".
(1) The sour and smelly Chen Taomi water. Also refers to dirty water.
(2) Soaking and panning. See "Long Di".
(3) Mix the food with starch to make it soft and smooth. Also refers to the soft and smooth food.
Shame
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Siji 1] [Water Word Department] 　潃; Kangxi Strokes: 15; Page Number: Page 648-24
【Historical Records·Canggong Biography】Sweat from illness. The one who wears clothes is sweaty. [Note] 潃, sound tour. ○According to "Words and Supplements", it is wrong and wrong.　潃The right side of the word is from 㣊, not from?
